AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.undocumented aliens: individuals suspected of crossing the border illegally, potentially traveling in a crowded pickup truck camper, often stopped by immigration agents based on their appearance and circumstances, indicated by fogged windows and heavy loading of the vehicle
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.pickup truck camper: vehicle stopped by United States Border Patrol on Interstate Highway 35 in Texas, carrying individuals suspected of being undocumented aliens, subject of a suppression motion regarding evidence obtained during its stop and search
